localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Heart Reports V2 can generate separate blood sugar, blood pressure, blood oxygen, heart rate, activity and sleep reports. All perfectly designed for printing, so you can easily show your Apple Health data to your doctor. Now with Widgets and Shortcuts support.
blogPost.body: Heart Reports V2 can generate separate blood sugar, blood pressure, blood oxygen, heart rate, activity and sleep reports. All perfectly designed for printing, so you can easily show your Apple Health data to your doctor. Now with Widgets and Shortcuts support.
blogPost.title: Heart Reports v2 - Export beautiful PDF health reports from the iOS Health app
blogPost.author: Viszt Péter

localize.description: Heart Reports V2可以单独生成血糖、血压、血氧、心率、活动和睡眠报告。所有报告都经过完美设计，可供打印，因此你可以轻松地向医生展示你的 Apple 健康数据。现在支持Widgets和快捷键。
localize.tagline: 从iOS健康应用中导出精美的PDF健康报告。

localize.description: Heart Reports V2可以單獨生成血糖、血壓、血氧、心率、活動和睡眠報告。所有報告都經過完美設計，可供打印，因此你可以輕鬆地向醫生展示你的 Apple 健康數據。現在支持Widgets和快捷鍵。
localize.tagline: 從iOS健康應用中導出精美的PDF健康報告。

previous.title:
One year ago today the S&P 500 fell 12%

It was the 3rd worst day in history

If you would have bought the market at the close that day you're now up 66%

(If you were a liar and instead bought at the very bottom on 3/23/20 you're now up 78%)

localize.full_text:
一年前的今天，S&P 500指数下跌了12%。

这是历史上第三糟糕的一天

如果当天收盘时你会买入市场，现在你已经涨了66%了。

(如果你是个骗子，而是在3/23/20的最底部买入，你现在涨了78%)

一年前的今天，S&P 500指數下跌了12%。

這是歷史上第三糟糕的一天

如果當天收盤時你會買入市場，現在你已經漲了66%了。

(如果你是個騙子，而是在3/23/20的最底部買入，你現在漲了78%)
